description:
Changelog (21/05/24)

* Fixed Infinite Loading Bug in 'My Favorites' Page.

* Improved Box Set Sorting and Search Result Accuracy.

* Added Invisible Seperators on Start Page for Better Presentation

title: EZTV
synopsis: EZTV, your one stop source for all your favorite TV shows.
